thoughts.text: Now that we have created a final list of the activities we want to do, we can use the `execute_shell` command to print a message to remind us to review our list and start planning our trip.
thoughts.reasoning: Printing a message to remind us to review our list and start planning our trip will help us stay organized and make sure we don't forget anything. Using the `execute_shell` command will allow us to print a message to the console.
thoughts.plan:
- Review our final list of activities to do in New York City
- Use the `execute_shell` command to print a message to remind us to start planning our trip
- Make sure to include any necessary details such as dates, times, and locations
thoughts.criticism: We should be careful not to forget anything important when planning our trip. We should also make sure to prioritize the activities we want to do so we don't miss out on anything.
thoughts.speak: Let's use the `execute_shell` command to print a message to remind us to review our final list of activities and start planning our trip.

args.command_line: echo Time to review our final list of activities to do in New York City and start planning our trip!
